label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_002
content:
## 2024-03-11 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 52
- Active: 52
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 5
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 17
- Standard: 17
- Placebo: 18

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.2
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 43.3
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.7
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 296.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 31.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 21.6
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 5.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.4

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.2
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 49.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.4
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 279.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 54.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.7
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.5
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.2
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.0
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 5.6
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.4

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 7.1
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 50.0
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.6
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 251.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 45.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 18.7
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.8
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.5
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 6.1
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.2

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 108
- Sessions Attended: 89
- Attendance Rate (%): 87.6

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.3
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.8
- WBC (k) SD: 1.9
- Platelets (k) Mean: 238
- Platelets (k) SD: 47
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 1.11
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.15
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 99.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 10.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 9.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-0220, Description: headache, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0255, Description: muscle spasm, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-0222, Description: Missed physical therapy session, not rescheduled within window, Severity: minor
- PD ID: PM-PD-0219, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB
- Opioid conversion table reference updated per FDA guidance

### Notes
- Week 2: Pain management assessments on track. 52 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
